body.name: EI 42pcs Wheat Straw Dinnerware Set,Unbreakable Reuasble Plates,Microwave Safe Plates and Bowls Sets,Lightweight Dinnerware for Camping,Picninc,Party-Black Bowls,Plates,Cups,Cutlery
features: Serves 6 Guest-Black wheat straw dinnerware set include 6pcs dinner plates,6pcs dessert plates,6pcs bowls,6pcs cups,6 forks,6 knives,6 spoons,Can cater for a small party of six people.

Safety first-Made from wheat straw, our dinnerware set is completely free from harmful chemicals like BPA and melamine. Enjoy your meal with confidence, knowing that you're using utensils that are safe for you and your loved ones.

Versatility at its finest-Our plates and bowls sets are not only ideal for meals, but they also make great serving dishes for parties and potlucks. Serve up your famous pasta salad or load them up with hors d'oeuvres – the possibilities are endless!

All Occasion-Say goodbye to flimsy paper plates! Our wheat straw dinnerware set is built to withstand even the most enthusiastic eaters, making it perfect for family gatherings, picnics, and college dorm room feasts. Get ready to dig in without worrying about your plate breaking!

Easy to Clean-Don't let clean-up be a chore. Our microwave and dishwasher safe dinnerware set makes mealtime clean-up a breeze. Spend more time enjoying your meal and less time scrubbing dishes. Now that's convenience without sacrificing quality!

Our plates and bowls sets are not only practical, but also versatile. The neutral black color matches any table setting and adds a touch of elegance to your meals. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality was great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to expensive china and paper plates
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this set, and we are so glad we chose to receive this sample to try out. All the pieces in this set wash easy, we have put them in the dishwasher with no issues, and they stack to store away very nicely.The material used to make this set is a type of hardened plastic it seems, but they are very durable and reliable. We have switched over to using only these versus glass plates, and it’s a nice feeling to know if you accidentally drop one of these it will not shatter all over your kitchen. The plates are big enough to eat supper on, the set has smaller plates for dessert or a snack, and the bowls are the perfect size for cereal or whatever you want to use them for.The one con I would list, even though it’s not a huge deal, but the spoons are pretty big and sometimes tough for a child to use. The forks work great and no worries about one of the prongs bending or breaking off when using. The knives surprisingly will cut many different meats without any worrying about a child cutting themselves or hurting themselves while using. Overall this complete set is great, well designed, built to last, great quality, and at the price point they are listed for they seem like a steal. I definitely recommend this set and I feel anyone would be happy using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EI 42-Piece Wheat Straw Dinnerware Set - Stylish, Durable, and Eco-Friendly
reviews.reviewText: Enhance your dining experience with the EI 42-Piece Wheat Straw Dinnerware Set in a chic beige color, offering a perfect blend of style and sustainability.Complete Dining Solution: This comprehensive set serves six guests, including 6 dinner plates, 6 dessert plates, 6 bowls, 6 cups, and a full set of cutlery (forks, knives, spoons). Ideal for small gatherings or family dinners, ensuring you have everything you need.Strong and Durable: Bid farewell to flimsy and easily breakable dinnerware. Crafted from reusable plastic, these plates are built to withstand everyday use, providing a durable and long-lasting solution for your dining needs.Safety First: Made from non-toxic and BPA-free materials, the wheat straw dinnerware set prioritizes your safety and peace of mind. The food-safe design ensures a healthy dining experience for you and your family.Versatile for All Occasions: Whether it's a casual family meal or a picnic in the park, this set is perfect for various occasions. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, its lightweight design makes it easy to carry, ideal for camping trips or BBQ parties.Environmentally Friendly: As a reusable and dishwasher-safe option, this dinnerware set is an eco-friendly alternative to disposable plates. Reduce waste and contribute to a sustainable lifestyle with this stylish and practical choice.Customer Satisfaction Guarantee: We are committed to delivering quality products. If, for any reason, you are not satisfied with your purchase, please reach out to us. Your satisfaction is our priority.Upgrade your dining experience with the EI Wheat Straw Dinnerware Set—a stylish, durable, and eco-friendly choice for your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These plates are NOT microwave safe in the slightest. They melt and warp badly after just one minute and feel worse than the cheap plastic plates I use to have before trying to replace them with these. DO NOT BUY!!! I want a refund so bad these are terrible…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Clean, Dishwasher and Microwave Safe, Great Daily Dishes
reviews.reviewText: This set of six place settings has pretty much everything I need for my daily use: 9.7" plate, 7.8" salad/dessert plate, 2 2/3 cup bowl, and a 1 1/3 cup cup. Plus the knife, fork, and spoon utensils.I just recently found out about wheat straw and am so happy I did as they're a bio-plastic that's eco-friendly and free of petroleum based plastics since there's no fossil fuels used to make it.Just, as you may have guessed, it's made out of a wheat by-product that was just being burned after the wheat was harvested so it's not only an eco-friendly alternative to petroleum based plastics it's using a waste product that was polluting the environment previously.Even better wheat straw is anti-bacterial and anti-odor! That's a win-win right there.Oh, and if anyone is worried that they're made out of wheat: they're gluten free.The set is really lightweight and crazy durable. It's safe for dishwashers (on the bottom rack even) and microwave too. I nuke stuff all the time with these and there's no scaring like you can get in petroleum plastics over time.These are my new daily-driver dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never heard of the material
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never heard of the material but it’s durable. It’s held up to a lot more than some of our other cheap plastic dishes. I love the shape for keeping things on the plate and stacking. I hate it for putting in the dishwasher. They fall over. Constantly. I’ve figured out that putting a small glass plate in between them keeps them from falling but still annoying. Depending on your dishwasher rack you may or may not enjoy the same problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars reliable, eco-friendly, and versatile plate set!
reviews.reviewText: This is very versatile said I use it for my every day use . I wouldn’t put anything that was staying on it. I haven’t tried, but I am familiar with these kind of plates, so they would seeing if you put some thing like spaghetti sauce on their. I love the color it’s called wheat, I can see it getting the black one but I thought black would be too dark.This dinnerware set is great for individuals or families looking for a reliable, eco-friendly, and versatile option. Its unbreakable nature and suitability for both indoor and outdoor use make it a practical choice, especially for those in college dorms or individuals who frequently host small gatherings.I think people in dorms would love this you got everything you ever need and it’s great. That includes utensils.
